abstract: In a move that furthers a wave of consolidation in the property trust sector, an investment group led by the Caisse de dépôt et placement du Québec has agreed to buy Canada’s largest hotel trust, Legacy Hotels Real Estate Investment Trust, for C$2.5 billion ($2.4 billion), according to a report in The Globe and Mail.
lead_paragraph: In a move that furthers a wave of consolidation in the property trust sector, an investment group led by the Caisse de dépôt et placement du Québec has agreed to buy Canada’s largest hotel trust, Legacy Hotels Real Estate Investment Trust, for C$2.5 billion ($2.4 billion), according to a report in The Globe and Mail.
